name: The Hotel (Eric Gabella)
description:
This horror game is a final year project I made some years ago and I'd like to share it.

You're an inspector who has the mission to discover what's going in some hotel. Although you think it's just about someone suspicious, you realize there's something else in that place...

Feel free to leave some comments below, I'd love to see people enjoying it halfas much as I did developing it :)
